items.title: What Stranger Things gets right about wormholes
bullets: • Stranger Things gets right about wormholes in the fifth season of the show
• The wormhole concept emerged from Einstein's General Theory of Relativity
• Theoretical physicists still use it to explore scientific questions today
• The story is set in Indiana in a fictional town called Hawkins that gets caught up with a paranormal world

items.title: Something was pumping enormous energy into a young galaxy cluster
bullets: • A young galaxy cluster has been found blazing with extreme heat far earlier than expected in cosmic history
• Researchers believe supermassive black holes may have rapidly heated the surrounding gas
• The finding could force a major rethink of how galaxy clusters grow
• The cluster is filled with intensely hot gas and existed just 1.4 billion years after the Big Bang
